name: Poliwag
flavorText:
Its newly grown
legs prevent it
from running. It appears to prefer
swimming than
trying to stand.

previous.name: Arcanine
previous.flavorText:
A POKéMON that
has been admired
since the past for its beauty.
It runs agilely
as if on wings.

next.name: Poliwhirl
next.flavorText:
Capable of living
in or out of
water. When out of water, it
sweats to keep
its body slimy.

pokemon.name: Poliwag
pokemon.flavorText:
Its newly grown
legs prevent it
from running. It appears to prefer
swimming than
trying to stand.

pokemon.name: Poliwhirl
pokemon.flavorText:
Capable of living
in or out of
water. When out of water, it
sweats to keep

pokemon.name: Poliwrath
pokemon.flavorText:
An adept swimmer
at both the front
crawl and breast stroke. Easily
overtakes the best
human swimmers.

pokemon.name: Politoed
pokemon.flavorText:
If POLIWAG and
POLIWHIRL hear its
echoing cry, they respond by gather­
ing from far and
wide.
